altTitles.ja: アイドル×アイドル　ストーリー！

description.en:
Mimi Nagisa (22 years old) is a former idol. After giving up on her dream of being an idol because of her lacking talent she spends her days working part-time while attending college. However, the moment she meets the idol Ibuki Nanakusa, whom she recently found interest in, their lives begin to cross each other.

(Source: Comic Fuz, translated)

[Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/idol2story_info)
description.ja: 才能がないと夢を諦めた元アイドルのミミと、ミミに憧れていた現役アイドル・イブキ。そんな2人が、ひょんな出会いから一緒にサバイバルオーディション番組への出演を目指すことに…!?　一度は諦めかけた夢、今度こそ2人でなら…！
description.ru: Мими Нагиса (22 года) — бывший айдол. После того, как она отказалась от своей мечты стать айдолом из-за отсутствия таланта, она проводит дни работая на неполный рабочий день, учась в колледже. Однако в тот момент, когда она встречает кумира Ибуки Нанакуса, к которому она недавно проявляла интерес, их жизни начинают пересекаться.

title.en: Netoge no Yome ga Ninki Idol Datta: Cool kei no Kanojo wa Genjitsu demo Yome no Tsumori de Iru

altTitles.ja: ネトゲの嫁が人気アイドルだった件～クール系の彼女は現実でも嫁のつもりでいる～

altTitles.en: My Web Game Wife Is a Popular Idol IRL

altTitles.vi: Vợ trong game của tôi là Idol nổi tiếng ngoài đời

altTitles.ru: Моя жена в онлайн-игре – популярный айдол

altTitles.th: ไอดอลสาวสุดปังกับผมแต่งงานกันในเกมออนไลน์ ~(แต่) แฟนสาวสุดคูลอยากเป็นเจ้าสาวในโลกจริงด้วย~

altTitles.en: My Wife in the Web Game Is a Popular Idol

description.en: Kazuto Ayanokoji is an ordinary high school boy. He spends his days playing online games as a hobby. One day, he discovers the true identity of a friend who is so close to him that they are married in-game. It turns out to be a cool idol from the same class, Rinka Mizuki. As Rinka tries to act as his wife in real life, Kazuto is forced to lead a dizzying life.
description.ja: 平凡な男子高校生・綾小路和斗には嫁がいる。ただし趣味のネトゲ世界で。ところが結婚相手の少女リンの正体は、学校のクラスメイトで人気アイドルの『水樹凛香』で!? 正体がバレて関係も終わり――かと思いきや、凛香は現実でも和斗の「嫁」として振る舞い始めて……。
description.vi: Ayanokouji Kazuto là một cậu học sinh cao trung bình thường. Cậu có sở thích là chơi game vào thời gian rảnh của mình. Một ngày, cậu phát hiện ra danh tính thật của người bạn thân mà cậu đã kết hôn trong game. Người đó không ai khác chính là Rinka Mizuki, một idol và cũng là một người bạn cùng lớp của cậu. Trong khi Mizuki Rinka cố gắng để cư xử với cậu như một người vợ, cậu phải trải qua một cuộc sống hằng ngày mệt mỏi.

altTitles.en: Another Happy Day for the Villainess

altTitles.fa: بانوی شرور امروز شاد و شنگوله

altTitles.my: အမွှေစိန်ဗီလိန်မလေးရဲ့ကံတရား

altTitles.th: นางร้ายสายเชิด

altTitles.mn: Хорон санаатан өнөөдөр ч баяртай байна

altTitles.id: Today the Villainess Has Fun Again

description.en:
My friend stole my boyfriend and then dared to hand me a wedding invitation with a smile? Ha! I had a blast enjoying my revenge and came home and fell asleep but...when I woke up I was in the body of the Villainess of a Romance Fantasy novel who has everything: appearance, assets, and intelligence. The only thing this girl lacked was the insight to judge a man. Throw the bastard Prince away to the main female lead and let us just enjoy the luxury of power and money!

---
From growing up in a dysfunctional family to being cheated on, Sojin never had it easy. So after waking up in the body of villainess Reilynn Candmion, daughter of the empire’s wealthiest duke, all she wants is to revel in her riches. But something feels amiss when the story’s heroine, Iris, constantly starts fights with her — from stealing her dress to seducing her fiancé. Reilynn wants no drama, but Iris and her four love interests won’t leave her alone! Can’t a girl just wanna have fun?
description.fa: یه روز زنی که به عنوان یکی زنان شهری قدرتمند و زیبا شناخته میشد درباره ازدواج دوست پسر سابقش شنید. از زندگی سیر شد و خواب به خواب شد "چراااا من شرور شدم؟" اون نقش یک بانوی شرور رو بازی می کرد که نامزد خودشو از دست داده و شخصیت اصلی زنو آزار میداد. هرچند هیچ چیز بدی درمورد اون وجود نداره چون این شرور همه چی داره! اما اولین کاری که باید انجام بده اینکه که از نامزد اشغال و دختر بازش بخواد که جدا بشن! "بیا از هم جداشیم." "…چی؟" "چیه؟فکر نمیکنی یکم بی انصافیه؟ " تو فکر می کنی منصفانه‌ست که از من بخوای وقتی با دختری دیگه ای قرار میزاری باهات ازدواج کنم؟

description.en:
A single encounter with a card will take you to the skies!
The Card Game that Soars through the Skies, this is Vanguard's New series, 'SkyRide'!

title.en: Otagai Dondon Hamatteiku Kyouikugakari to Shinnyuushain

altTitles.ja: お互いどんどんハマっていく教育係と新入社員

altTitles.ja-ro: Otagai Dondon Hamatteiku Kyouikugakari to Shinnyuushain

altTitles.en: The Mentor and the New Employee Who are Getting More and More Into Each Other

description.en: Koishi wanders around Gensokyo, tasting different foods from different places (not bothering with asking for it first). But why is she in such a journey in the first place?
description.vi: Một Komeiji Koishi rất canon, đi lang thang khắp Gensokyo và ăn ké đồ ăn của người khác. Parody của Kodoku no Gourmet.

altTitles.ja: あつまれ！ふしぎ研究部

description.en: Goryo Daisuke is still unsure about which club to join. When he meets the three girl members of Mysterious Research Club while looking for the school's warehouse, he gets hypnotized to sign the registration form. Suzu who is obsessed with scary curses, Chiaki who only relies on her monstrous strength to perform dangerous magic tricks, and Kotone who can control people by hypnosis.
description.es-la: Goryou Daiseuke aún está indeciso sobre a qué club unirse en su escuela. Cuando conoce a tres chicas miembros del “Club de Investigaciones Misteriosas” mientras buscaba el almacén de la escuela, es hipnotizado por ellas y, sin saberlo, firma una solicitud de ingreso. Suzu, quien está obsesionada con las maldiciones, Chiaki quien confía en su monstruosa fuerza para realizar actos de magia y Kotone, quien puede controlar a la gente con hipnosis. Ahora comienza una nueva y caótica vida para Daisuke, siendo el conejillo de indias del club.
description.pt-br: Goryo Daisuke ainda não sabe ao certo a qual clube ingressar. Quando ele conhece as três garotas do Clube de Pesquisa Misteriosa enquanto procura o depósito da escola, ele fica hipnotizado para assinar o formulário de inscrição. Suzu, que é obcecada por maldições assustadoras, Chiaki, que só conta com sua força monstruosa para realizar truques de mágica perigosos, e Kotone, que pode controlar as pessoas por meio da hipnose.

description.en: A remake of the original Mazinger Z manga in celebration of its 50th anniversary. This manga is the in-universe story of the manga that Gekiman creates in the autobiography manga [Gekiman! - Mazinger Z Chapter](https://mangadex.org/title/a6d69815-f5f9-4ab8-9d53-5b4d1ee6601e/gekiman-mazinger-z-chapter)

altTitles.ja: おるちゅばんエビちゅ

description.en: A very unique, funny manga that follows the exploits of Ebichu, a talking female hamster with a dirty mind. This manga includes sexual dialogue, some nudity, and the occasional sex scene. There's also some violence against hamsters. It's all pretty lighthearted, but if any of this stuff offends you, don't read it.

A wandering prince set off to break an ancient curse bewitching the Kingdom of Amaryllis by waking up its princess with a kiss of true love. However, nobody told him there were 7 princesses to kiss and he must now take responsibility by living with them while they find out why the people of Amaryllis are unable to wake up. Will they reach a happily ever after?
description.fr: Un prince errant est parti pour briser une ancienne malédiction qui ensorcelle le royaume d'Amaryllis en réveillant sa princesse par un baiser d'amour véritable. Cependant, personne ne lui a dit qu'il y avait 7 princesses à embrasser et il doit maintenant prendre ses responsabilités en vivant avec elles pendant qu'ils découvrent pourquoi les habitants d'Amaryllis sont incapables de se réveiller. Parviendront-ils à être heureux pour toujours ?

title.en: The Plain Girl Sitting Next to Me

altTitles.ja-ro: Tonari no Seki no Jimi na Yatsu

altTitles.ja: となりのせきのじみなやつ

description.en:
Kawase Sonoe ain't much to look at. Plain, serious and uninteresting, sure, but for some reason, her next-seat neighbor Mori Ichika can't stop staring at her.

Mori follows her and discovers that Kawase has an awful lot to show her, and that she'll receive from Kawase an education that she can't admit she needed.

From Newtype site:  
  
Our ages are different, our ways of life are different, everything is different. But… I just want to be with you!  
Because I've never been in a miserable, tragic romance, I can say that unrequited love is fine…  
I don't know why I fell in love with this person…it's a mystery!  
  
They have different personalities, different ages, different ways of thinking, different looks, different everything.  
This is the story of girls who clumsily make up for what's lacking in the other.  
  
T/N:  
These are side stories. Not a rewrite of the original serialized twitter comic. It builds up on what happens in the main series in a longer format. It eventually merges with the main series in the volume edition.
   
The kind of stories these are is all in the title!  
  
不揃 (fuzoroi) means uneven, irregular, but also incomplete. 連理 (renri) is "entwined relationship".  

So, these are stories of intimate relationships between "incomplete" girls that somehow complete each other, against all odds.

title.en: Saikyou Yuusha Party wa Ai ga Shiritai

altTitles.ja: 最強勇者パーティーは愛が知りたい

altTitles.en: Hero's Party Want to Experience LOVE

altTitles.ja-ro: Saikyō Yūsha Pātī wa Ai ga Shiritai

description.en:
The strong and popular hero won't let me (the unpopular mage) go for some reason!!!
The adventures of the strongest hero's party is full of strange love.

title.en: Tying the Knot with an Amagami Sister

altTitles.fr: Se Marier avec une Sœur Amagami
Comment j'ai Marié une Sœur Amagami

altTitles.es-la: El Emparejamiento de la Familia Amagami

description.en: Kamihate Uryuu, orphaned since childhood, receives an invitation to stay at the local Shinto shrine. All he wanted was a quiet place to study so that he can fulfill his dream of making it into a top medical school, but after arriving there, he comes across three beautiful shrine maiden sisters... and the head priest requests that he marry one of them and take over the shrine. A tale of love and miracles is about to unfold!
description.fr: Kamihate Uryuu, orphelin depuis l'enfance, reçoit une invitation à séjourner dans le sanctuaire shinto local. Tout ce qu'il voulait, c'était un endroit tranquille pour étudier afin de réaliser son rêve d'entrer dans une grande école de médecine, mais en arrivant sur place, il tombe sur trois belles demoiselles du sanctuaire... Le prêtre en chef lui demande d'épouser l'une d'entre elles et de prendre la succession du sanctuaire. Une histoire d'amour et de miracles est sur le point de se dérouler !
description.ja: 京大医学部を目指す高校生の上終 瓜生。児童養護施設育ちの瓜生は「甘神神社」の宮司さんに引き取られ、居候することに。受験勉強ができる環境があれば…と思っていたが、居候の条件は「婿養子として神社を継ぐ」こと!? しかも結婚相手は同居する巫女三姉妹!! 一つ屋根の下、巫女と紡ぐ恋と奇跡の物語、開幕!!
description.ru: Камихатэ Урю долгое время прожил в приюте, пока не был взят под опеку священником Тидори Амагами. Остановившись в храме, Урю узнаёт, что здесь живут три жрицы-сёстры, которые являются внучками главного священника. В конечном итоге, Тидори Амагами рассказывает, что взял парня под опеку, чтобы он женился на одной из его внучек и унаследовал храм, как его зять. Так начинается история любви и чудес с семьёй Амагами.
description.es-la: Un chico que había perdido la fe en las Oraciones y los Dioses, de pronto conocerá a 3 hermosas Hermanas que son Doncellas del Templo donde comenzará a vivir, ¿Esto afectará de alguna Manera a nuestro Protagonista? Léelo para descubrirlo.

description.en: The "Couples Game" is played between a man and a woman who love each other. It is a competition in which couples compete to complete a set of instructions. The stage is an abandoned amusement park. The winning couple will receive a prize of 100 million yen and eternal love. The tragic game begins with the words, "Say you love me."

Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

title.en: Konya wa Docchi no “Ore” ni Dakaretai? Joushi ga W de Ero Zenkai ni Sematte kimasu!!

altTitles.ja: 今夜はどっちの“オレ”に抱かれたい？ 上司がWでエロ全開に迫ってきます！！

description.ja:
「大丈夫？元気ない…？」穏やかで優しい理想の上司がーー
「もうイキそうになってんのかよ」毎晩夢の中で強引に迫ってくるのですが!?

霊感強めなOL・里浦志保の悩みは、幽霊に夜な夜な夢の中に入り込まれてしまうこと。
でも、最近なぜか片想い中の上司・穂積さんが現れるように…！
夢の中の穂積さんは、姿はそっくりでも雰囲気は全く違う上にとってもエッチ！
そんな彼の正体を知る為にも、凄腕と噂の霊媒師さんに視てもらうがーー…

「ナカからもいじってやるから、今の声もっと聞かせろ」
私を見下ろす顔も、囁く声も、敏感なところを知り尽くした指先も……
やっぱりどう見ても私の大好きな穂積さんとしか思えませんーー!!

description.en: The sixth part of the Baki series.
description.ru: Продолжение великой эпопеи "Баки". 6-я номерная серия тайтла, которая поведает нам нереальную историю сражения Джека Хаммера и доисторического человека Пикла!!!
description.tr: Büyük destan Bucky'nin devamı. Jack Hammer ve tarih öncesi adam Pickle arasındaki savaşın gerçek dışı hikayesini anlatacak olan Baki'nin 6 numaralı serisidir!!!
description.pt-br: Jack derrubou o mundo do sumô, agora ele irá desafiar a todos para seu torneio. Desta vez uma nova jornada.

title.en: I Fell in Love, so I Tried Livestreaming.

altTitles.en: I Fell in Love so I'm Streaming it
I'm Streaming Now! Because I Fell in Love

altTitles.ja-ro: Koi Shita no de, Haishin Shite Mita

altTitles.zh: 因為戀愛於是開始直播

altTitles.ja: 恋したので配信してみた

description.en: Inuzuka Yuu is unable to make any friends due to his mean face and awkwardness. But because of his enrollment to high school, he has the opportunity to enter the dorms. However, it was a share house between 6 people, 3 girls and 3 boys filled with secrets!?
description.pt: Inuzuka Yuu é incapaz de fazer amigos, devido à sua cara de malvado e seu jeito desajeitado. Mas, devido à sua matrícula no ensino médio, ele tem a oportunidade de entrar no dormitório estudantil. No entanto, era uma casa compartilhada entre 6 pessoas, 3 garotas e 3 garotos cheios de segredos?!
description.ru:
Инузука Юу совсем не умеет улыбаться и всё свое детство был изгоем,но он намерен всё изменить! Поступив в старшую школу он поселяется в общежитии. Кроме него там еще 2 парня и 3 красотки, но что-то тут не так .Что же они скрывают? Совместная жизнь полная тайн и секретов начинается!  
  
[Here's a way to support the author!](https://imgur.com/a/4jBwkXe)

title.en: My Husband Who Hates Me Has Lost His Memories

altTitles.en: My Husband Hates Me, But He Lost His Memories
My Resentful Husband Lost His Memories

description.en: In a politically arranged marriage devoid of love, Lily is wed to Theodore, the head of a rival family. Theodore loathes the union, but little does he know that Lily despises her own family as much as he does. Living a quiet life, she counts the days until their inevitable divorce. Then fate intervenes—a sudden accident erases Theodore’s memories of her, transforming his coldness into unexpected affection. Can Lily trust this dramatic shift, or must she guard her heart to avoid future heartbreak?

altTitles.ja: 魔王令嬢から始める三国志～董白伝～

altTitles.en: Awakening in the Three Kingdoms as the Demon's Granddaughter ~The Legend of Dong Bai~

altTitles.ja-ro: Maou Reijou kara Hajimeru Sangokushi ~Touhaku Den~

altTitles.ru: Пробуждение в Троецарствии как Дочь Демона ~ Легенда о Дун Бай ~

description.en: Shirokawa Sasane (30) is a former trading company employee and a huge fan of Romance of the Three Kingdoms. One day, after losing consciousness in Chinatown, he wakes up to find himself in the form of a little girl. However, the new body he finds himself in isn't just any little girl, but the granddaughter of the infamous tyrannical Dong Zhuo, Dong Bai. In order to avoid the fate of being executed alongside Dong Zhuo, Dong Bai will have to use both experience as a Japanese businessman as well as knowledge of the era!

altTitles.th: 【เกิดใหม่เป็นลูกโอชิ】

altTitles.pt-br: Oshi no Ko - Minha Estrela Preferida

description.el:
H Άι Χόσινο είναι ένα ανερχώμενο μουσικό είδωλο, η οποία ανακοίνωσε ξαφνικά οτι θα πάρει ενα διάλειμμα από το μουσικό της γκρουπ, Μπι-Κομάτσι, για λόγους υγείας. Προς εκπλήξη ενός από τους μεγαλύτερους θαυμάστες της, του γυναικολόγου Γκόρο Αμεμίγια, μια μέρα η νεαρή Αϊ εμφανίστηκε στο νοσοκομείο οπού δουλεύει. Ο Γκόρο έρχοντας πλεον πρόσωπο με πρόσωπο με την αδυναμία του, τρέμει στο γεγονός ότι η 16-χρονη Αϊ είναι έγκυος... με δίδυμα με τον πατέρα άφαντο. Αποφασισμένη να αποκτήσει την δικιά της οικογένεια και να συνεχίσει την δουλεία της ως είδωλο, έχει σκοπο να κρατήσει την γέννα των παιδιών της μυστικο, μαζί με την βοήθεια του Γκόρο.

Το δυνατότερο όπλο ενός ειδώλου ειναι τα ψέματα.
Μια ίστορια μυστηρίου και εξαπάτησης, όπου η σκοτεινή πλευρά της σόου-μπιζ αποκαλύπτεται κάτω από τις στρώσεις ψεμάτων και εκμεταλεύσεων.
description.en:
The story begins with a beautiful girl, her perfectly fake smile, and the people who love her selfishly for it.  
  
What transpires behind the scenes of the glittering showbiz industry? How far would you go for the sake of your beloved idol? What would you do if you found out reincarnation was real? The star of the show is Aquamarine Hoshino and the stage is but a mere facade. Will he manage to reach the climax before the world of glamour swallows him whole?
description.es:
'Oshi no Ko' explora la vida de una abrumadoramente hermosa heroína y muestra la industria del entretenimiento desde un punto de vista nunca antes visto.

- [Wikipedia](https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oshi_no_Ko)
description.fa: آی هوشینو ۱۶ ساله یک آیدول با استعداد و زیباست که هواداران زیادی داره؛اون نماد پاکیه، ولی ظاهر با باطن قضیه متفاوته. گورو هوندا یک پزشک زنان که ساکن حومه‌ی شهره که یکی از طرفداران بزرگ آی هستش، ولی ناگهان آیدول مورد علاقه خودش رو ملاقات میکنه و متوجه میشه که اون بارداره، گورو به اون قول میده که بچش رو سالم بدنیا بیاره، ولی اون نمیدونست که این ملاقات باعث عوض شدن زندگیش میشه.
description.fr:
L'histoire commence avec une belle fille, son sourire parfaitement faux, et les gens qui l'aiment égoïstement pour cela. Que se passe-t-il dans les coulisses de la brillante industrie du showbiz? Jusqu'où iriez-vous pour votre idole bien-aimée ? Que feriez-vous si vous découvriez que la réincarnation est réelle? La star du spectacle est Aquamarine Hoshino et la scène n'est qu'une simple façade. Parviendra-t-il à atteindre le point culminant avant que le monde du glamour ne l'avale tout entier?  


---

- [Nominated for the 14th annual Manga Taisho awards.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2021-01-24/14th-manga-taisho-awards-nominate-10-titles/.168759)

- [Wikipedia](https://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oshi_no_ko)
description.ja: 「この芸能界（せかい）において嘘は武器だ」　地方都市で、産婦人科医として働くゴロー。芸能界とは無縁の日々。一方、彼の“推し”のアイドル・星野アイは、スターダムを上り始めていた。そんな二人が“最悪”の出会いを果たし、運命が動き出す…!?
description.ru:
Что, если бы дорога в шоу-бизнес была открыта для тебя с самого начала?  
Новая серия оригинальной манги от двух известных авторов — Акасака Ака («Госпожа Кагуя: в любви как на войне») и Ёкояри Мэнго («Тайные желания отвергнутых»). Это совершенно новая работа, в которой мир шоу-бизнеса предстаёт перед читателями в очень необычном свете: у лидера идол-группы Хосино Аи есть секрет, о котором никто не должен знать…  


---
- [Wikipedia](https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oshi_no_Ko)
description.vi:
Câu chuyện khởi đầu với sự xuất hiện của một cô gái xinh đẹp, mang nụ cười giả tạo hoàn hảo, và có những người yêu cô ấy một cách ích kỷ bất chấp điều đó.

Điều gì diễn ra đằng sau ánh hào quang của thế giới showbiz? Con người ta sẽ làm đến mức nào vì thần tượng yêu quý của mình? Bạn sẽ làm gì nếu phát hiện ra luân hồi chuyển kiếp là có thật? Nhân vật chính của chúng ta - Aquamarine Hoshino liệu có hoàn thành được khát vọng báo thù trước khi bị thế giới hào nhoáng ấy nuốt trọn? Hãy cùng đón xem bộ truyện được sáng tác bởi bộ đôi tác giả của Kaguya-sama và Kuzu no Honkai.
description.es-la:
La historia comienza con una hermosa chica, su sonrisa perfectamente falsa y la gente que la ama con egoísmo gracias a eso.
  
¿Qué ocurre detrás de la brillante industria del espectáculo? ¿Hasta dónde llegarías por el bien de tu ídolo? ¿Qué harías si descubrieras que la reencarnación es real? La estrella del espectáculo es Aquamarine Hoshino, y el escenario no es más que una mera fachada. ¿Conseguirá llegar al clímax antes de que el mundo del espectáculo se lo trague por completo?
description.pt-br: Doutor Goro é obstetra em um hospital do interior e se encontra longe do mundo em que brilha e evolui Aï Hoshino, uma cantora de sucesso crescente da qual é fã absoluto. O que ele ainda não sabe é que sem mais nem menos ele se encontrará com sua idol favorita em uma circunstância um pouco fora do normal. Terá ele tempo suficiente para ficar perto dela ou o mundo irá girar de maneira cruel para ele? Essa é uma história sobre o mundo do entretenimento japonês.

altTitles.ja: シャドーハウス カラー版

description.en:
Faceless shadow nobles living in a vast mansion, attended by living dolls who spend much of their time cleaning up the soot endlessly emitted by their mysterious masters.  
  
Follow the story of Emilyko, a young and cheerful living doll, as she learns her duties serving as the attendant for Kate Shadow-sama. What dangers and dark secrets will she and Kate encounter, as they become more deeply involved in the inner workings of the shadows' society?
description.es:
Nobles sombras sin rostro que viven en una vasta mansión, atendidos por muñecos vivientes que pasan gran parte de su tiempo limpiando el hollín emitido por sus misteriosos maestros.  
  
Sigue la historia de Emilyko, una joven y alegre muñeca viviente, mientras aprende sus deberes como asistente de Kate Shadow-sama.
description.ja: 不思議な洋館に住む、 顔のないシャドー一族と、 世話係の“生き人形”たち。 彼らが織りなす、 摩訶不思議な日常とは…？
description.ru: Безликие теневые дворяне, живущие в огромном особняке, сопровождаемые живыми куклами, которые проводят большую часть своего времени, очищая сажу, бесконечно испускаемую их таинственными хозяевами.
description.es-la: Sombras nobres vivem em uma imensa mansão e são servidos por bonecas vivas que passam a maior parte do tempo limpando a fuligem solta pelos misteriosos mestres. Siga a história de Emilyko, uma boneca viva jovem e animada, enquanto ela aprende seus deveres como serva de Kate Shadow-sama.
description.pt-br: Sombras nobres vivem em uma imensa mansão e são servidos por bonecas vivas que passam a maior parte do tempo limpando a fuligem solta pelos misteriosos mestres. Siga a história de Emilyko, uma boneca viva jovem e animada, enquanto ela aprende seus deveres como serva de Kate Shadow-sama.

altTitles.ja: リィンカーネーションの花弁

description.en: Striving for talent, Senji Touya tries everything he can so he can find it. Kendou, dancing, swimming, basketball, soccer, chess… anything he tries, he fails to exceed it. One day, his classmate, Haito, came to school for once in a long time. Senji refers to her as someone who "has it" or someone who has talent. Later on, he found out that she isn't just someone who has talent, but someone who "took" the talent of herself in her past life. And, those who "took" the talent from their past lives, are also known as "Returners"…

May 2003. An icy planet from distant space crashes into Venus, changing its qualities completely. These qualities prove to present some habitability for humans, enticing men to eventually colonize it for themselves...

80 years later, Venus is home to many people who call it home. However, an ever-present tension between the two major continents, Aphrodia and Ishtar, points to an ominous fate for Venus.

Hiroki Senoo is a rather rebellious member of a motorsport popular within Aphrodia's capital. One day, members of Aphrodia's military approach Hiroki, and, impressed by his skills, invite him to join. Thus, Hiroki finds himself enveloped in Venus's political landscape...

title.en: Dakara Katte ni Yuusha Toka Haou ni Nintei Sunno Yamero yo! ~Elf Zoku mo Kokuou-sama mo Hirefusu Hodo Ore wa Idai na Yakuwarirashii~

altTitles.ja: だから勝手に勇者とか覇王に認定すんのやめろよ！～エルフ族も国王様もひれ伏すほど俺は偉大な役割らしい～

altTitles.ja-ro: Dakara Katte ni Yuusha Toka Haou ni Nintei Sunno Yamero yo! Elf Zoku mo Kokuou-sama mo Hirefusu Hodo Ore wa Idai na Yakuwarirashii

altTitles.en: Stop Labeling Me as a Hero or Overlord Without Permission! ~It Seems My Role Is So Great That Both the Elves and the King Bow Down~

description.en: Sage is an adventurer who decides to return to his hometown after being dumped by a woman. On his way home, he saves two beautiful elves who have collapsed on the roadside, and as a result, he is celebrated by the hero without permission!? The days of hardship begin for Sage, who has been certified as the overlord!

altTitles.vi: Pháo đài của Sách Khải Huyền

altTitles.th: ผีดิบล้างโลก

description.en:
What can you do when you're mistakenly accused for murder? Nothing. You just go to prison. Lucky you; your inmates are some of the biggest cutthroats in the prison. Seriously, you are lucky. Especially when zombies attack.  
  
  
 [Official Thai](https://www.vibulkijshop.com/category/103/%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%AD%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B1%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%99-action/%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%B0%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%AA%E0%B9%8C-%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%82%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%81)   
 [Official Korean](http://book.interpark.com/amway/product/BookDisplay.do?_method=detail&sc.shopNo=0000400000&sc.prdNo=255646966)

Minamoto-kun has a face pretty enough to make people think he's a girl. Because of his face, he was bullied by the girls in middle school who were jealous of his face. He developed a fear of women due to the trauma and ended up attending a high school for boys. Just as he enters college and makes a promise to himself to overcome the trauma of his past, his father remarries and asks him to move out of the house. His father arranges him to live with his aunt (Minamoto-kun's father's younger sister) for the time being. She is an extremely beautiful woman who is also a non-tenured professor at his college. When he arrives at her apartment, she shows him her breasts and tells him that he will be her "guinea pig" in her reverse Hikaru Genji project.
description.pt: Minamoto-kun tem um rosto bonito o suficiente para fazer as pessoas pensarem que ele é uma menina. Por causa de seu rosto, ele foi intimidado pelas meninas no ensino médio que estavam com ciúmes de seu rosto. Ele desenvolveu um medo de mulheres devido ao trauma e acabou frequentando uma escola para meninos. Justo quando ele entrar na faculdade e faz uma promessa a si mesmo de superar o trauma de seu passado, seu pai se casa novamente e pede para ele sair da casa. Seu pai arranja-lhe para viver com sua tia no momento. (irmã mais nova do pai do Minamoto-kun). Ela é uma mulher extremamente bonita, que também é professora adjunto em sua faculdade. Quando ele chega em seu apartamento, ela lhe mostra os seios e diz que ele será a sua "cobaia" em seu projeto Genji Hikari.
description.ru: Лицо Минамото-куна настолько прекрасно, что его легко спутать с девушкой. Из-за этого девушки в средней школе над ним часто издевались и дразнили. Тогда же он и получил серьёзную психологическую травму: боязнь представительниц противоположного пола. В результате всё закончилось переводом в школу для мальчиков. Сразу после поступления в колледж, он решает раз и навсегда избавится от детской травмы. Но тут его отец снова женится и просит сына съехать из дома и пожить с его младшей сестрой – тётей Минамото. Тётушка оказывается очаровательной женщиной, которая, к тому же, преподаёт в колледже Минамото-куна. Переехав к ней он узнаёт, что будет объектом её исследований. По мотивам классического японского романа «Повесть о Гэндзи».

description.en:
The more he carries, the stronger he becomes! An unmatched fantasy by the weakest adventurer duo!

Ryuk, a boy with a unique skill “Porter,” which allows him to carry a massive amount of items, was being exploited as a chore boy for the S-rank party “Black Lion of Foresight.” One day, the party managed to acquire a storage item more convenient than Ryuk’s skill, thus no longer needed, Ryuk is banished inside a dangerous dungeon. Despairing in this hopeless situation, suddenly he meets a shrine maiden girl, Mio — and then?

Yuushi Kamome is a freelance writer who lost his beloved daughter in an accident. In despair, his wife leaves him, and he spends his days like a shell of a man. One day, however, a flyer from a strange religious group, the "Heart Laughing Society," changes his fate. It shows the image of his wife, whom he has lost touch with...This is a story of faith and madness. What is the black darkness of the cult that an evil smile invites? A chilling “new religion” suspense begins!
description.ru:
Томодзи Камомэ — писатель-фрилансер, потерявший любимую дочь в результате несчастного случая. В отчаянии от него уходит жена, и он проводит свои дни в одиночестве, закрывшись от внешнего мира.
Однако однажды листовка странной религиозной группы «Общество смеющегося сердца» меняет его судьбу. В ней он увидел свою жену, с которой потерял связь...

title.en: Eiyuu to Kenja no Tensei Kon ~Katsute no Koutekishu to Kon'yakushite Saikyou Fuufu ni Narimashita~

altTitles.ja: 英雄と賢者の転生婚～かつての好敵手と婚約して最強夫婦になりました～

altTitles.en: The Reincarnated Marriage of a Hero and a Sage: After Becoming Engaged to a Former Rival, We Became the Strongest Couple
Reincarnated • The Hero Marries the Sage ~After Becoming Engaged to a Former Rival, We Became the Strongest Couple~

description.en:
Reid, a young hero with the strongest physical strength, and Elria, a beautiful sage with the strongest magic prowess.

They continued to fight as rivals in opposing enemy nations, but their relationship came to an end with the sudden death of Elria… Then, a thousand years later,

Reincarnated in a world where magic reigns supreme, but he who has retained the strongest physical strength from his previous life, Reid, was reunited with Elria, who has also been reincarnated―

“Hey, Reid— I want you to marry me.”

“…Huh?”

The two, who have become the strongest unaware lovey-dovey couple in a thousand years, enrolled in the Royal Magic Academy to decide who is stronger!
description.ja: 英雄・レイドと賢者・エルリアは長きに渡り戦っていたが、賢者の死により戦いは唐突に終わる。レイドは敵国に乗り込みエルリアの遺体の前で壮絶な死を遂げた…と、思ったら自分は赤子で世界は千年後に!?

description.en:
Heo Jeong-woo, a high school student who is bullied by a girl in his class for his weakness.
 
Han Bo-ra, a transfer student, comes to Jeong-woo's class, where he was spending his miserable days.

Jeong-woo feels a strong sense of déjà vu when he sees the child with straight black hair and stains on his legs. Sure enough, Han Bo-ra, who has subdued the arguing classmates, asks them.

"'Have you ever seen a child similar to me?

Jeong-woo decides to approach Bo-ra, who might be able to correct what is wrong...

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?originalProductId=522173)
description.ko:
같은 반 여자애에게 약점을 잡혀 괴롭힘 당하는 고등학생 '허정우'. 피폐한 나날을 보내던 정우의 반에 전학생 '한보라'가 온다. 까만 생머리와 다리에 얼룩을 가진 그 아이를 보고 정우는 강한 기시감을 느낀다. 아니나다를까, 시비 거는 반 아이들을
제압한 한보라는 그들에게 묻는다. '나랑 비슷한 애 본 적 있어?' 어쩌면 꼬인 것을 바로잡아줄 보라에게 정우는 접근하기로 하는데...

title.en: Ore dake Fuguu Skill no Isekai Shoukan Hangyakuki ~Saijaku Skill "Kyuushuu" ga Subete o Nomikomu made~

altTitles.ja: 俺だけ不遇スキルの異世界召喚叛逆記～最弱スキル【吸収】が全てを飲み込むまで～

altTitles.en: I'm the Only One with a Failure of a Skill in Another World's Summoning Rebellion: Until the Weakest Skill [Absorption] Swallows Everything

description.en: The student Nakatani Yuto was supposed to be having a regular life, however his whole class was transferred to another world. All the students gained powerful skills and were worshipped as heroes, but for Yuto who got the unfavorable skill [Absorption]...! ?
description.ja: 高校生の中谷夕斗は突然クラスメイトと共に異世界へ「勇者」として召喚されてしまう。クラスメイト達が強力な技能（スキル）を授かるなか、ユウトが授かったのは不遇スキル【吸】であった。 使い物にならないユウトは魔物との戦闘で致命傷を負うが、クラスメイトは彼を見殺しに…。その瞬間、ユウトにはどこからともなく“声”が聞こえて――…!?

description.en:
"Young Master Chi, you're not going to help me unconditionally, are you?"

"You'll find out soon enough what this deal entails. Now, all you need to do is give me an answer. Do you want this opportunity or not?"

"Yes, I do."

Chi Mingyao made a deal with an actor who was brave enough to block him because of a car accident. He only wanted to tease the little actor at first, but eventually, he genuinely wanted to befriend Li Yangxiao and pass on his good luck to him—all so that Yangxiao could chase his dreams without a care in the world.

Kinnikuman (Muscleman), a weak and clumsy super hero, constantly getting into wacky situations. As the series progressed, the story began changing from comedy to action as Kinnikuman battles stronger and stronger foes in the wrestling ring. The series continually introduced new Super Human characters, known as Chojin, who would challenge Kinnikuman and his friends for various purposes.  
    
---
- **The original run was from 1979-1986 and ended with Vol. 36. The series directly continued in 2011 with Vol. 38.**
- **The 2011 Chapters resets the Count to 1 during it set of volumes (Beyond Vol 36)**

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 1985**
description.pt-br:
Kinnikuman (Homem Músculo), um super-herói fraco e desajeitado, constantemente entrando em situações malucas. À medida que a série avançava, a história começou a mudar de comédia para ação, enquanto Kinnikuman lutava contra inimigos cada vez mais fortes no ringue de luta livre. A série continuamente introduziu novos personagens Super Humanos, conhecidos como Chojin, que desafiariam Kinnikuman e seus amigos para vários propósitos. 

A serialização original foi de 1979-1986 e terminou com o Vol. 36. A série continuou diretamente em 2010. 

Ganhou o Shogakukan Manga Awards por melhor Shounen em 1985.

title.en: My Clumsy and Erotic Neighbor Sayuri-san

altTitles.ja: 不器用でエロい隣人さゆりさん

altTitles.es-la: Mi torpe y erótica vecina Sayuri-san

description.en: Series Follows Our Main Character and His Interactions With His Neighbor Sayuri-san.
description.ja: 高校生の主人公が、隣人の主婦である「さゆりさん」と様々なエロティックなシチュエーションを繰り広げるというストーリー。

altTitles.th: ขบวนการกำมะลอ

description.en:
Thirteen years ago, suddenly the Villainous Army of evil appeared in their gigantic floating castle 10000 meters in the sky to invade Earth!

The villainous army have reviving capabilities that make them immortal, making them a serious threat to humanity. To protect us against these invaders, the Divine Dragon Rangers, the Dragon Keepers, wield their miraculous powers and their weapons, Divine Tools, and continuously fight for our safety!

The assault of the Villainous Army! The vigilance of the Dragon Keepers! Will they succeed in their conquest…?

From Haruba Negi, the creator of *5Toubun no Hanayome*, comes the action-packed superhero series of a lifetime!
description.es: ¡Hace trece años, el Ejército Villano del mal apareció de repente en su gigantesco castillo flotante a 10.000 metros en el cielo para invadir la Tierra! El ejército villano tiene capacidades de revivir que los hacen inmortales, lo que los convierte en una seria amenaza para la humanidad. Para protegernos de estos invasores, los Rangers Dragón Divino, los Guardianes del Dragón, empuñan sus poderes milagrosos y sus armas, las Herramientas Divinas, ¡y luchan continuamente por nuestra seguridad! ¡El asalto del Ejército Villano! ¡La vigilancia de los Guardianes del Dragón! ¿Tendrán éxito en su conquista? ¡Descúbrelo en la serie de superhéroes llena de acción de toda la vida!
description.fr:
Il y a 13 ans, un château flottant est apparu à 1000 mètres au-dessus du sol et une armée maléfique est venue dans le but d'envahir l'humanité.
Afin de protéger l'humanité contre ces envahisseurs, des super-héros se battent, mais les choses ne semblent pas être comme elles le paraissent !
description.ru: Тринадцать лет назад армия монстров таинственным образом объявилась на территории людей, паря в воздухе на своем летучем замке! Армия монстров обладает различными способностями, которые могут грозить человеческой безопасности. Дабы защитить мирных жителей от вторжения на землю, доблестные герои - Хранители Дракона в составе из пяти человек выходят на поле правосудия! Используя свой туз в рукаве под названием «артефакт», боевой отряд героев из года в год, каждое воскресенье усмиряет неугомонных монстров. Однако, спустя 999 поражений, один из членов команды монстров решает отомстить героям!.. С этого момента и разворачивается наша история борьбы добра со злом!
description.pt-br: Há treze anos, de repente, o Infame Exército do mal apareceu em seu gigantesco castelo flutuante 10.000 metros no céu para invadir a Terra! O exército vilão tinha capacidades de reviver, o que os tornava imortais, tornando-os uma séria ameaça para a humanidade. Para nos proteger contra esses invasores, os Divine Dragon Rangers, os Dragon Keepers, manejam seus poderes milagrosos e suas armas, Ferramentas Divinas, e lutam continuamente por nossa segurança! O ataque do Exército Vilão! A vigilância dos Dragon Keepers! Eles terão sucesso em sua conquista...?

description.en: Ji Gwi, a lad who became a heated ghost after loving Queen Sun Duk one-sidedly. Eun Chong, a descendant of Ji Gwi, found that by touching the Hong Kong exchange student Hae Bum, his body temperature lowers. So seeking help -"If the type of touching changes the body temperature, shouldn't we progress this further?" Due to the very forward Hae Bum, Eun Chong's life becomes shaken.
description.ko: #지귀설화 #인외물 #캠퍼스물 #홍콩계 혼혈공 #절륜공 #미인수 #시작은 섹파 선덕여왕을 사모하다 화귀가 되어버린 청년, 지귀. 지귀의 후손으로 열에 시달리던 은총은 홍콩에서 온 교환학생, 해범과 몸이 닿을수록 열이 가라앉는다는 사실을 알게 된다. 그리고 그에게 도움을 요청하는데— "스킨십에 따라 발열 정도가 달라진다면, 어제보다 진도가 더 나가야 되지 않겠어요?" 적극적인 해범으로 인해, 은총의 일상이 흔들리기 시작한다.

title.en: The Maid Whose Salary Increases the More She Goes Viral

altTitles.ja: バズった分だけお給料が上がるメイドさん

altTitles.ja-ro: Bazuttabun Dake Okyuuryou ga Agaru Maid-san
Bazuttabun Dake Okyuuryou ga Agaru Meido-san

altTitles.en: The Maid Whose Salary Increases the More She Goes Popular

altTitles.de: Die Maid, deren Gehalt sich erhöht, je mehr sie viral geht

description.en:
The more likes and retweets she gets on Twitter, the higher her pay goes.

---

**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/93205912) (All 5 chapters are combined into this one Pixiv post.)

altTitles.en: Ended Up Living with a Classmate

altTitles.ja-ro: Classmate to Issho ni Sumu Koto ni Natte shimatta

altTitles.ja: クラスメイトと一緒に住むことになってしまった

description.en: It's a collection of short manga stories about interacting with a girl, sometimes romantically and sometimes not.
A short farewell story

A dramatic story set in the past of Gensokyo, before the creation of the spell card rules, following around a young Reimu. Unofficial and non-canon. Published in the web edition of Strange Creators of Outer World.

Super serious and uptight high school student Koutaro Suzuki and his obnoxious gyaru kouhai Sorako Mozu get along like cats and dogs. She spends her days tormenting him, while he spends his days getting outraged by her. However, the two of them share a secret...that they're living together as fiancés!! Under the condition that Koutaro marry Sorako, who comes from a wealthy real estate family, they've agreed to buy his father's company and save it from going under!!

Having to deal with Sorako, who uses this and that (and you know what) to torment him, can Koutaro make her yield and successfully marry her?!

---
**Links:**

description.ja: クソ真面目で融通が利かない男子高校生・鈴紀光太郎は生意気な後輩ギャル・百舌そら子と犬猿の仲。そんな二人には秘密が…それは二人が許嫁関係で同棲していること!? 資産家の家族を持つそら子と結婚をする条件で、光太郎は潰れる寸前の父の会社を買収してもらっていたのだ!! あの手この手（エッ●なこと）で責めるメスガキそら子にたいし、光太郎は彼女を屈服させ、無事に結婚をすることができるのか――!!?

altTitles.ja: 波原さんはぶちまけたい！

description.en:
The company she entered was a black IT company... It's such a pain... I want to quit... "Boss, will you please die soon? (Good morning!)"

With a sudden change (?), her honne (inner thoughts) and tatemae (public behavior) switched!? It's always been what she thinks, but, but... As a worker, she can't say it!?  
  
Her hidden "inevitable" honne, becomes a shield against harsh superiors! A pleasant and thrilling comedy!

A fabled genius at killing resides somewhere hidden in Tokyo. Taught since childhood to obey the orders of his boss, he is ordered to live in Osaka as a normal person for one year in order for the boss to lay low.    ---- **Won the 41st Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2017**
___
[Alt Official English (US ONLY)](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10055/episode/323851)

title.en: S-Rank Party Kara Kaikosareta [Jugushi] ~"Noroi no Item" Shika Tsukuremasen ga, Sono Seinou wa Artifact-kyuu nari......!~

altTitles.ja: Ｓランクパーティから解雇された【呪具師】～『呪いのアイテム』しか作れませんが、その性能はアーティファクト級なり……！～

altTitles.en: My S-Rank Party Fired Me for Being a Cursificer: I Can Only Make “Cursed Items”, but They're Artifact Class!

description.en:
Gaile, a Cursificer, is left penniless when he's expelled from his party as soon as they reach S Rank. Apparently he wasn't contributing enough?! But they hadn't realized that his cursed items outperform even holy relics and legendary equipment!

Gaile decides to try to make a living on his own off of his cursed items.
description.ja:
【呪具師】のゲイルは大して貢献していないと、パーティがＳランクに昇格したと同時に無一文で追い出される。しかし、彼らは理解していなかった。ゲイルの作る呪具は、そこらの聖遺物や勇者の装備をも凌駕する性能を誇っていたことに…。ゲイルは呪具を活かして一人で生きていこうと決意しーー。

風変わりな職業・呪具師の大活躍が新感覚の爽快感で大反響!!
description.pt-br:
A versão mangá de um dos romances de fantasia isekai mais populares de Shousetsuka ni Narou!

Gaile, um Cursificer, fica sem um tostão quando é expulso de seu grupo assim que chegam ao Rank S. Aparentemente ele não estava contribuindo o suficiente?! Mas eles não tinham percebido que seus itens amaldiçoados superam até mesmo relíquias sagradas e equipamentos lendários!

Gaile decide tentar ganhar a vida por conta própria com seus itens amaldiçoados.

description.en:
Atsuko and Yuri were classmates in elementary, junior high, high school, and college, although they hardly ever spoke to each other during their school days. At their first reunion in 15 years, Atsuko discovers Yuri's secret and makes a move.

What is the destination for these two opposites, who have different personalities, interests, and groups?

altTitles.en: Let's Have a Toast With Miso Soup!

description.en:
Zenichirou is a middle school student raised in a motherless family. His breakfast always consists of onigiri and instant miso soup from the convenience store. Yae, a childhood friend of Zenichirou, cannot stand to see him eat such an innutritious breakfast, so she decides to make him breakfast every morning…  
  
This story conveys a simple message: eating with another person makes miso soup taste more delicious and hearty!

In lands far..far away, where scary monsters and horrific creatures live. where hidden treasures and magic exists, where there are still undiscovered kingdoms and empires mankind discovered a new source of energy to empower their mechanical machines & weapons. we discovered vanilla the source of unlimited energy. follow the journey of gen orchid, rosa & altamiras as they seek the djinn chef master to grant their wishes

story & art by me & my wife, together we are couple comics #fantasy_Manga_to_read
